column4: Someone told me that 12.04 handels x displays differently for multipule monitors, does anyone know what changed
Minas: most ppl dont notice the diff from closed and open
Minas: even Intel card ppl have difficulty from what i hear

I'm asking because sometimes my pc just freezes for a few moments, then logs off itself. Then the screen flickers all the time... I was using the proprietary ATI driver. Is there a possibility that that was the problem?
